means: 把（感情等）寄托于不值得寄托的对象
忘记把…放在什么地方，把…放错位置

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"丢失，遗失"之意。
means: lose ： 最普通用词，侧重遗失了，难以找回来。
miss ： 着重发觉某人或某物不见的瞬间，也可作思念解。
misplace ： 指反映东西放错或故意放错地方。

sentence.Network_en: I often misplace something that she should have put away.
sentence.Network_cn: 我经常把她本该放起来的东西放错了地方.

sentence.Network_en: Grandfather used to misplace his glasses.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的祖父从前总是把眼镜乱放,经常找不到.

sentence.Network_en: Biometrics promises identities that are virtually impossible to steal, impersonate or misplace.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种生物科技测量标准的特徵是近几乎不可能被偷取, 假扮,或误置.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 帮我举一些mis做前缀的词语_百度知道 ... mispronounce 发错音 misplace 放错地方 miscount 数错.
10_ffffffffff_新浪博客 ... surrender: 交出、让与 misplace: 放错 brussel sprout: 芽甘蓝、茅甘蓝.
浅析英语单词的背诵方法 - 豆丁网 ... misspell 拼错， misplace 错放 multi 多，如.
misoperation 错误动作misplace 装错misplacement 错位

list.abs: confide... ... repose trust in 信任［赖］某人某事 misplace one's confidence 误信（某人）， 信任不可靠的人 in confidence 秘密地.
托福经验：托... ... 2. Fragmentary sentences( 破句) 3. Misplaced Modifiers( 修饰语错置) 5. Dangling modifiers( 悬垂修饰语).
二． 修饰语错位（Misplaced Modifiers） 例１． I believe I can do it well and I will better know the world outside the campus. 剖.
肖脱基缺陷 Schottky disorder错位原子 misplaced atoms自由电子 Free Electrons
商标 LBL./label商标错位 label misplace上臂围 upper arm

entry.tran: 把…放在一时记不起的地方;(因记不起放在何处而)暂时丢失
entry.def: If you misplace something, you lose it, usually only temporarily.

example.ex: He misplaces his reading glasses with such regularity that aides carry extras...
example.tran: 他老是记不起把自己阅读时用的放大镜放在什么地方，所以助手们会随身携带备用的。

example.ex: Somehow the suitcase with my clothes was misplaced.
example.tran: 不知怎的，我忘了把装衣服的箱子放到哪里去了。

means.word_mean: 1. place (something) where one cannot find it again;
2. place or position wrongly; put in the wrong position;

auth_sentence.content: I'm sorry if your child really did suffer, but your ignorance is causing you to misplace your anger.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm sorry if your child really did suffer, but your ignorance is causing you to misplace your anger.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm sorry if your child really did suffer, but your ignorance is causing you to misplace your anger.

means.word_mean: 把(感情等)寄托于不值得寄托的对象

sentences.en: Her confidence in him was entirely misplaced.
sentences.cn: 她完全错误地相信了他。

means.word_mean: 忘记把…放在什么地方;把…放错位置

sentences.en: The dictionary may have been misplaced somewhere else.
sentences.cn: 字典可能被放到别处去了。
